import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Header.css"; const Header = () => { const [isDarkMode, setIsDarkMode] = useState(false); const themeToggle = () => { setIsDarkMode(!isDarkMode); document.body.classList.toggle("dark-theme", !isDarkMode); document.body.classList.toggle("light-theme", isDarkMode); }; return ( <>

); }; export default Header;
